pullrequest.title: Bump ign-common version and use weak pointers in lambdas

content.raw: One question that came up by running the tests. You can see in [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/ign-gui0/src/display\_plugins/GridDisplay\_TEST.cc](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/ign-gui0/src/display_plugins/GridDisplay_TEST.cc) line **41**, that we create a Scene3D. This plugin instantiates a scene using ogre engine. Later in this test, in line **155**, we call stop which should clean up every plugin, like the comment says. This includes the **Scene3D plugin**, which deletes the scene in its destructor. After this, it fails in line 175 because the scene was destroyed along with the mentioned plugin. Is something that I’m missing? Or we should expect for a nullptr instead?
content.html: One question that came up by running the tests. You can see in #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/ign-gui0/src/display_plugins/GridDisplay_TEST.cc line 41, that we create a Scene3D. This plugin instantiates a scene using ogre engine. Later in this test, in line 155, we call stop which should clean up every plugin, like the comment says. This includes the Scene3D plugin, which deletes the scene in its destructor. After this, it fails in line 175 because the scene was destroyed along with the mentioned plugin. Is something that I’m missing? Or we should expect for a nullptr instead?

pullrequest.title: Bump ign-common version and use weak pointers in lambdas

content.raw: I'm going to merge this into the `gui0_use_rendering2` branch since I don't have access to the fork used by this PR.
